column4: hi, I acidently deleted content of folders /etc/network and etc/networkmanager how to reinstall, as kubuntu now does not detect wireless card
perhaps this works.. sudo apt-get install --reinstall network-manager knetworkmanager
try this, if it doesn't work, i'm out of ideas.  sudo apt-get install --reinstall $(dpkg -l | grep -i net | cut -c 3-30)
